about: This type of driver will never talk he will just sit and drive no matter what, even we ask for something about location he wont speak these kind of drivers are few i called them as INTROVERT DRIVERS...

These type of drivers are basically extroverts because they will share all their difficulties with us while we are travelling sometimes they ask for suggestions and sometimes they ask for help they seems like they are hardworkers... i feel sad about them what about yoouu do you know any of them ??
